basic.description:
A wide range of topics of current importance in computing, including technical issues, professional questions, and moral and ethical decisions. Students make presentations, deliver papers, and engage in discussion.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36S;84P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Social, Ethical and Legal Issues in Computing

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registered in a COMP Major or BMCO or COCA or COGS or COMA or CSCI or SODE Specialization Plan and (CISC365 or COGS300).
